title: Nigeria: Buhari Commiserates With Families of Nigeria Air Force Crash Victims
text:
Sierra Leone/Cote d'Ivoire: Cote d'Ivoire Leaves Out Toure for Sierra Leone Tie 
He prayed for the repose of their souls and also prayed Almighty God to grant the families the fortitude to bear the irreplaceable loss. 
The Dornier-228 aircraft crashed into a house at Ribadu Cantonment, Kaduna on Saturday morning, killing all passengers on board. 
Dele Alonge, NAF spokesperson said no casualty was recorded on ground. 
He said the aircraft was Abuja bound and had taken off at about 6:45a.m. from the Kaduna Military Airfield before the mishap. 
Mr. Alonge added that Chief of the Air Staff, Sadique Abubakar, an air marshal, has set up an investigation panel headed by an Air Vice Marshal to unravel the cause of the accident with immediate effect. Nigeria
